page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS:SWANSEA WEST
page.content: The local people interviewed were concerned about a variety of issues, including :_ 1) a recent murder in a Swansea "sex shop":many thought that the shop should be closed; 2) children being housed in "highrise" flats:there were fears for the safety of such children; 3) the threat to the casualty unit at Singleton Hospital:the distance to the alternative unit was too great; 4) litter on Gower beaches:many wanted action to clear up these places; 5) extension of Hendrefoilan Student Village: the new buildings were seen as a threat to the local woodlands; 6) some people are annoyed by buses waiting outside their homes for long periods with the engines running, especially as there seemed to be few passengers on these services.
